welcome_message_body: Welcome to Jefferson, the charming city known for its rich history and beautiful landscapes. We hope you enjoy your stay and explore all the wonders this city has to offer.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: This is the main terminal of Municipal Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal is exclusively for private jets and charters.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport, free of charge.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Caldwell Wright Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Caldwell Wright Airport caters to private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Teterboro Airport serves all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Aviation Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal is dedicated for private aviation services, offering upscale amenities and services for private jet passengers.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: Serves domestic and international flights for airlines such as United Airlines, Air Canada, and JetBlue.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: Serves domestic and international flights for airlines such as American Airlines, Delta Air Lines, and Spirit Airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal C
terminals.description: Serves domestic and international flights for airlines such as United Airlines and Alaska Airlines.

wifi.note: Limited to 30 minutes per device, premium options available for purchase.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Linden Airport serves both commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Linden Airport caters to private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
